title: Umm theres certain heroes you can't ban?
body: Azir and Rek'Sai and stuff were missing from the character list every time it was my turn to ban. Seems you can only ban champions you own? I find it very odd you can't ban some heroes. Moment it went to other teams ban choice they reappeared in list only to disappear again when my ban time came up.

replies.body: can't ban champs the other team doesn't own
if no one on the enemy team has the champions then they wont show up in the ban screen :)
This. The list shown for banning is a compiled list of all the champs owned by everyone on the other team.
You can only ban champions owned by one or more champions on the enemy team. That way you don't waste a ban on the Kassadin that no one even owns...
